title: The White ship
creator_credit: Hector Lemieux, Rex Tasker and ONF | NFB
brief_description: Shows one of the Portuguese schooners that still fish the Grand Banks of Newfoundland. Follows the ship and its crew from the time the townsfolk turn out for the blessing, until the ship returns with the season’s catch, and leaving one crewman in a Newfoundland grave.
creator_credit_for_label: Hector Lemieux, Rex Tasker and ONF | NFB
